rois.name: bias_readout
rois.description: ROI covering the displayed bias value (V) in Nanonis.

rois.name: scan_status
rois.description: ROI covering scan status. It's an icon made of 2 balck bars. If the Icon is in balck, then it means the scanning is in progress. If the icon is in balck and has a squre gray shadow background, then it means the scanning is on paused. If the icon is in faded gray color, it means there's now scaning in progress.

rois.name: current_readout
rois.description: ROI covering the displayed current value (A) in Nanonis.

rois.name: scan_time_countdown_readout
rois.description: The scan time count down indicated the time that current scan needs to finish.

anchors.name: bias_input
anchors.description: Click target inside the bias input box.

anchors.name: scan_start_from_top_button
anchors.description: Click target on the Start Scan From Top button.

anchors.name: scan_start_from_bottom_button
anchors.description: Click target on the Start Scan From bottom button.

anchors.name: current_input
anchors.description: Click target inside the current input box.
